subject: Hello,
body:
Hello,
 
We are operating a funding program that offers collateral-free loans
and project funding to individuals, organizations, and private
establishments.
 
If you are seeking funding for a specific shovel-ready project, you
will be funded at 2% principal annual interest.
 
If you would like to collaborate with us as a middleman/facilitator,
you will earn 5% of the total project cost or loan as your commission
for every successful loan or project funding deal facilitated by you.
Our loan is special and we would clarify you with more details, Please
get in touch if this is of interest to you for further details.
 
 
Regards,
CFO

subject: Re:   Hello,
body:
Hello,

Thank you for reaching out and sharing this information. It sounds like an interesting opportunity. I'm curious to know more about your funding program. Could you please provide more details about how it works? 

Also, could you clarify what you mean by "principal annual interest"? And when you mention acting as a middleman, what would that entail exactly?

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Ricky
